timeline.bodyText:
What types of objects do we plan to put in the context?
CoroutinesContext has Dispatcher, Job, Name, maybe more
ExecutionContext will have OkHttpExecutionContext and what else ? Do we plan to put dispatchers/executors down there too ?
timeline.author: martinbonnin

replies.bodyText: For now we put just http context, but in future for new runtime we are going to put cache policy, cache headers, cache normalization records etc. Also any implementation of future request executor (now it's called Apollo interceptor) can put whatever it wants.
replies.author: sav007

timeline.bodyText: Just a small thing. Since all modules has Kotlin dependency transitively, it is also added to runtime module. So it is ok to write this now with Kotlin.
